Room.Name: Necroplis Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are at a bend in the Necropolis path. The Walk of Heroes is south.
Room.LongDescription: From the west there is a grove of trees, strange for a Necropolis, but indeed, the ground coverage prevents you from seeing what lies beyond the barrier of trees. The path here leads west around the Necropolis and south to the Walk of Heroes. From the north a cold breeze sends a chill down your spine. it comes from the mausoleum.
